amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 207 of the bill which pertains to limitations on attorneys' fees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 112-73 to strike section 207 of the bill which pertains to limitations on attorneys' fees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 239 (Roll no. 307).
